Module applications
Package applications.database_gui_application

Class HoursEditModeController

java.lang.Object
applications.database_gui_application.HoursEditModeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class HoursEditModeController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for managing the edit modes (ADD, EDIT, REMOVE) for "Hours" table data.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    HoursEditModeController.Mode
    Enumeration to determine the edit mode types for "Hours" Table data.
